RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 36. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VAMONOS PIACENTE quick to begin to set an uncontested early pace and drew off the through the stretch run under a strong hand ride. CABARET FLEUR tracked the early leader from the inside, angled out into the upper stretch to take aim but was no match for the winner in the drive. A P'S RUNAWAY DIVA void of early speed, swung six to seven wide into the lane and closed in mildly. UNEXPECTEDVALENTYN dropped back off the early pace setters, saved ground and lacked a bid. GEMSHINE chased the early pace, raced near the inside past the five sixteenths pole, angled out and was empty in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Cabaret Fleur
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, angled upper stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Vamonos Piacente
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, drew off, strong hand ride

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. David J. Casalinova Sr.

ENTRY.NAME: Unexpectedvalentyn
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground, lacked bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD THREE YEAR OLDS, 125 LBS.; OLDER, 126 LBS. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUPPLY CHAIN rated along the inside under a firm hold down the backstretch, moved up two wide from the outside of Cumber to challenge near the quarter pole and drew off to be clear under steady handling. SHELL FIRE dropped back to race mid pack early, raced near the inside at the quarter pole, shifted out four wide in the drive and finished gamely late to narrowly get up for the place position. DISTORTED LIMITS stalked the pace, raced near the rail around the far turn through the stretch and kept on willingly to the wire. MAYTHEHORSEBWITHU stalked the pace two deep and weakened through the stretch run. CUMBER was coaxed along to a clear early lead, was met nearing the quarter pole by Supply Chain and faded in the drive. IT'S FATE was void of early speed and never was a factor. ADIOS BOBBY raced five wide around the first turn, lost ground to race far back and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Supply Chain
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P Burnsworth Richard and Buyea Kristina
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, 2 wide bid 1/4, drove clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fergus Galvin, Tony Holmes & Sarah Holmes

ENTRY.NAME: Shell Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, inside far turn, shifted 4p, game

ENTRY.NAME: Distorted Limits
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, inside far turn, rail bid stretch, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Adios Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 5wd 1st turn, far back, no bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.

CLAIM.OWNER: Yoder Susan and Rivera Alan Yahir

RACE.FOOTNOTES: GO GIRL showed good early speed to set the early pace along the inside and held well to be clear late under steady pressure. I'M JAC'D tracked the early leader from the inside down the backstretch around the far turn, shifted three wide into the upper stretch to race from the outside of Go Girl but couldn't get by in a game effort. WEEKENDING was under a hard chase two deep and weakened a bit through the drive. C MORE PRIDE was off slowly, moved up along the inside around the far turn into the upper lane and flattened out. TV TIZ GORGEOUS dropped back off the early pace set, raced two to three wide and lacked a bid. TITEBLUEJEANS was mid pack early on, swung five wide into the upper stretch and had no late rally. ONE RICH KITTEN settled off the early going, raced three to five wide around the far turn and had no response.

ENTRY.NAME: Titebluejeans
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, swung 5-w upper stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: C More Pride
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, inside run, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 97. Claiming Purse 17700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 20. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONFESSOR stalked the pace, moved up to take aim near the three sixteenths pole five deep, shifted in through the stretch run and drew off to be clear under strong encouragement. ORO DE MORO MORO pressed the early leader two deep from the outside, had command into the far turn, dug in and gave way grudgingly to the winner late. APPRAISAL pressed the early pace from the outside of rivals down the backstretch, raced three wide between in the stretch run and kept on willingly to the wire. CUGINE dropped back early on, ridden four deep from the outside near the three eighths pole, raced six wide into the upper stretch and was even late with no closing run. DISCLOSURE raced off the early going, was three to four wide around the far turn and never threatened. THE HONORABLE ONE settled off the early pace setters, raced three wide between near the quarter pole and had no response. INDIAN EMPIRE showed good early foot from the inside, dropped back nearing three eighths pole and gave way in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: The Honorable One
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, 3 wide between 1/4, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Disclosure
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3-4 wide far turn, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Indian Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, dropped back 3/8, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Confessor
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 5-wide aim 3/16, shift in, drove clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 97. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OVER THE HILLS was hard sent near the rail, set the early pace, raced off the inside in the stretch run and held well in a determined effort under strong handling. OUT OF CENTS stalked the pace, raced near the inside around the far turn, eased out into the upper lane and finished gamely to the wire. FREEDOM RIDER dropped back to race mid pack, made a three to two wide bid in the lane and finished willingly to the wire. I'LL FIGURE IT OUT dropped back off the early going, swung six to seven wide into the upper stretch and flattened out with no final winning bid. DOCTOR WU raced near the inside past the five sixteenths pole, angled out through the upper lane and raced evenly in the drive. STATESBORO void of early speed, shifted in nearing the three sixteenths pole, angled back out near the eighth and closed in belatedly from the far outside. PATIO PARTY was forwardly place along the inside and weakened. KOZY'S WILDCAT was under a hard chased three deep and gave way in the drive. MAKING ME CRAZY was off slowly, lag in the early stages and lacked a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Over the Hills
ENTRY.COMMENT: hard sent rail, held well, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Cents
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, inside turn, eased out, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: I'll Figure It Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, swung 6-7w upper stretch, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRULY INCLUSIVE dropped back off the early pace, moved up through the far turn, raced six deep into the upper stretch and finished well to edge clear under strong handling. BODE'S ROSE dueled near the rail and gave way to the winner grudgingly. MIZZEN THE POINT raced off the early going, was fanned seven to eight wide into the upper stretch and moved up late to improve position. SWEET OUTLOOK pressed the early pace three wide from the outside of foes and weakened through the drive. ROCKY CHANNEL raced near the back of the pack early, was two to three wide in the drive and needed more. YOU NAME IT stalked the pace, raced two wide near the quarter pole and weakened. ARTIES CRYPTONITE void of early speed, saved ground and never threatened. MY PINK BABY BIRD raced four to five wide and never menaced. TWENTY FOUR KARAT vied for the early lead two deep and gave way in the drive. WAR MOON failed to sustain a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Arties Cryptonite
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, saved ground, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Bode's Rose
ENTRY.OWNER: Pocket Aces Racing LLC and Susan Anderson Racing LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Rocky Channel
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 2-3 wide bid, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Mizzen the Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, fanned 7-8w upper stretch, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: War Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Truly Inclusive
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 6wd upper stretch, finished well, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IZZY'S MONSTER tracked the early leader three wide, had command near the seven sixteenths pole and widened its lead to race well clear in the stretch while being kept to pressure. FLAXEN dropped back early, raced five wide into the upper stretch but was no match for the winner in the drive. AWILDAS TREASURE pressed the early pace between rivals, raced three deep in the drive and kept on to secure third place finish. GIRLINTHEFIREPLACE stalked the pace from the outside, raced three to five wide and raced evenly with closing run. GRAN CHEMIN was squeezed back at the break, raced three wide and never was a factor. SHE IS ROYALTY lag early on to trail, swung wide into the upper stretch and never threatened. POLISHED GEM pressed the early going from the inside and tired readily.

ENTRY.NAME: She Is Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: lag, swung wide upper stretch, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Izzy's Monster
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3w, command 7/16, long lead, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Chemin
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C

ENTRY.NAME: Flaxen
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5wd upper stretch, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 27500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 20 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CREDIT RIVER showed good early speed along the inside to set the early pace and held gamely to be clear under strong handling. AQUITANIA ARRIVAL tracked the early leader two deep from the outside of Credit River and kept on gamely to the wire. R CARDINAL PRINCE stalked the pace, raced near the inside at the quarter pole, angled out and finished willingly to the wire. AGNELLO'S DREAM dropped back to race mid pack, was two to three wide in the drive and raced evenly to the wire. GOING IN STYLE raced five wide around the first turn, pulling hard early from the outside of foes and faded in the stretch run. CENTSOFWANDER settled early, raced five wide near the three sixteenths pole and had no response. STAR ENTERTAINER fanned six wide around the first turn, raced off the early pace, saved ground into the upper stretch and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Centsofwander
ENTRY.OWNER: Fisher Teresa K and Fisher James

ENTRY.NAME: Going in Style
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Star Entertainer
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6-wide 1st turn, inside upper stretch, no bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 9 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 20 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPENCER'S BOY LUNA raced at the back of the pack, made a strong bid around far turn, circled the field five wide and edged clear late under strong handling. COUTH stalked the pace, raced two wide near the quarter pole, dug in from the inside in the stretch and finished willingly to the wire. ERNIE'S MARTINI stalked the pace, moved up four to five wide into the upper stretch and flattened out. GOODBYELLOWBRICKRD was forwardly placed to lay up closed early, was three deep near the quarter pole and weakened while racing from the outside. STOP THE SPREAD pressed the early pace between rivals down the backstretch and faded. STIRDATPOT showed good early foot from the inside and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Ernie's Martini
ENTRY.OWNER: Chesney, Stephen and Hoffman, Cory S.
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4-5 wide upper stretch, flattened out,
